plot outline: Four friends lead the carefree life, romancing girls, attending college and dealing with the taunts of their parents. Then, one of them is stuck in a situation that gets them to take up the system in their own hands, Will they emerge victorious?
title: Abhaya Hastha
plot: Four friends lead the carefree life, romancing girls, attending college and dealing with the taunts of their parents. Then, one of them is stuck in a situation that gets them to take up the system in their own hands, Will they emerge victorious?::Sunayana Suresh

The protagonist, along with his three close college friends, leads a fun-filled life until his dad passes away due to heavy drinking. To support his family, he decides to work as an accountant for his father's friend Reddy. However, Reddy is a corrupt owner of multiple businesses and a medical college in the city, compelling him and his friends to revolt against Reddy and his malpractices. Will they be successful in their revolt?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
